component.name: GElectrical
component.summary: Electrical distribution network design and analysis

description.p: GElectrical is a graphical frontend to pandapower for power supply simulation and analysis with emphasis on electrical distribution and utilisation networks. Program is in early development with following features currently implemented/ in active developmnet. * Schematic capture. * Network generation from schematic. * Power flow analysis. * Voltage drop analysis. * Short circuit analysis. * Print and export of drawings to pdf. * Generation of analysis reports.
